pullRequest.title: Improve CSS styles for Wizard Taxonomy control
pullRequest.bodyText:

Checklist

Description of change
Change Wizard Taxonomy control's styles so that it displays properly with different resolution.

commit.message: Improve CSS styles for Wizard Taxonomy control.

nodes.bodyText: nit: be nice to have a blank line on either side of this block, but hey.

commit.message: Add blank lines before and after style '.autocompleteControl .btn'.
Fix scss formatting issue for Wizard Taxonomy control.

nodes.bodyText: This would have an overall width or 100% + 10px could this cause an overflow issue?

commit.message: Use calc() function to calculate the width of Taxonomy control.
